textBeforeTable: Here are some sample ratings and corresponding point caps: Your point cap is based on your highest active personal rating from the previous week. For an arena team rating to be considered active, the team must have played at least one match during the previous week, and you must have played in at least 30% of the team’s total matches that week. In the case of rated battlegrounds, to be considered active you need to have played a minimum of one single match in the previous week. If you don’t meet either of these requirements during one week, the following week your point cap will temporarily return to the default of 1343 until you again meet the above requirements to be considered active for the next week. If you want to be able to earn more than 1,343 Conquest Points in a single week, then you'll need to increase your personal rating above 1,500 by participating in Rated Arenas or Rated Battlegrounds. Only your best personal rating counts, and as you improve and bring your rating over 1,500, your weekly point cap will rise as well -- and if you manage to achieve a very high rating, your weekly cap could approach 3,000.
